message: How often is order tracking updated?
response: The order tracking is typically updated every 6 hours, however, I'm currently unable to provide an update as there seems to be an issue with the order ID. Please ensure you have provided the correct order ID and try again later for the latest status update.

message: Can I return something I already got?
response: To be able to process a return, we require an order number or details about your previous purchase so that our system can locate it in our database. If you have your order ID, please provide it, and I'll guide you through the return process. Otherwise, if you don't remember the order ID or have any questions, feel free to share more information about your recent transaction, and I'll do my best to assist you. Keep in mind that items must be returned within 15 days of delivery according to our company policy.

message: When will I get a refund?
response: To process a refund for your return, we need to first receive the item back. After we have received and processed your return, it usually takes 7-10 business days for the refund to be credited back to your original payment method. However, since you don't seem to have your order ID yet, I would recommend checking your email for any transaction confirmation messages that might contain the order number. If you are unable to locate it, feel free to share more details about your purchase so I can help you find it and guide you through the return process.
